title: 157 - Smoking Butts At The Gas Pump
description: On today's show, the boys chat about what they've been watching, Connor narrowly avoids a slap bet that was made months ago, Mitt details his experiences on TikTok and what hole he seems to find himself always falling into, they discuss the whale who swallowed a lobster diver and spit him back out, people who smoke cigs while pumping gas, and much much more in a loaded Pod FOD. Don't forget to subscribe to the Youtube page to watch full episodes of the show, and send your submissions to the FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all, and we'll see you on Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
